metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the thug - Dribbles-doppelganger associate. Stands near the animal cages. She's mean and eager for violence.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book, Act 3, Wyrm's Crossing, Circus of the Last Days. Move through the circus to the right, towards Dribbles' stage. You'll see this character next to the dinosaur Crimson's cage.

0.speaker: Doppelganger
0.text: Ah bloody hells - Crimson did a runner. I'm gonna get my head kicked in for this.
0.context: NodeContext: being mean - hoping that will happen

1.speaker: Doppelganger
1.text: Don't get too close, or Crimson here might decide you look tasty.
1.context: NodeContext: being mean - hoping that will happen

2.speaker: Doppelganger
2.text: If Crimson bites them little fingies off, don't come crying to me.
2.context: NodeContext: being mean, hoping that will happen
